entry.title: Apache Struts 路径遍历与远程代码执行漏洞
entry.content:
漏洞信息

漏洞名称： Apache Struts 路径遍历与远程代码执行漏洞

漏洞编号：

  • CVE： CVE-2023-50164

漏洞类型： 目录遍历

漏洞等级： 严重

漏洞描述： Apache Struts 2.5.33和6.3.0.2+版本中存在路径遍历漏洞，攻击者可以通过操纵文件上传参数上传恶意文件，并可能执行远程代码。此漏洞要求攻击者能够操纵上传参数。

产品厂商： Apache

产品名称： Struts

影响版本： 2.5.33, 6.3.0.2+

搜索语法： http.title:”struts2 showcase”

来源： https://github.com/projectdiscovery/nuclei-templates/issues/12302

类型： projectdiscovery/nuclei-templates:github issues

来源概述

Description:

Struts 2.5.33 and 6.3.0.2+ contain a path traversal caused by manipulation of file upload parameters, letting attackers upload malicious files and potentially execute remote code, exploit requires attacker to manipulate upload parameters.

Severity: Critical
POC:
  • https://vulncheck.com/xdb/676c45378050
  • https://github.com/Pixel-DefaultBR/CVE-2023-50164
  • https///github.com:Pixel-DefaultBR/CVE-2023-50164.git
  • https://github.com/Trackflaw/CVE-2024-10924-Wordpress-Docker
  • https://vulncheck.com/xdb/891b149617f9
  • https://github.com/NikitaPark/CVE-2023-50164-PoC
  • https///github.com:NikitaPark/CVE-2023-50164-PoC.git
  • https://vulncheck.com/xdb/78854c0dc088
  • https://github.com/AsfandAliMemon25/CVE-2023-50164Analysis-
  • https///github.com:AsfandAliMemon25/CVE-2023-50164Analysis-.git
  • https://github.com/sunnyvale-it/CVE-2023-50164-PoC
  • https://vulncheck.com/xdb/17870a6362f9
  • https///gitlab.com:Hamdane10/cve-2023-50164.git
  • https://vulncheck.com/xdb/83f6fcc57b59
  • https://github.com/snyk-labs/CVE-2023-50164-POC
  • https///github.com:snyk-labs/CVE-2023-50164-POC.git
  • https://github.com/aaronm-sysdig/cve-2023-50164
  • https://github.com/miles3719/cve-2023-50164
  • https://github.com/Trackflaw/CVE-2023-50164-ApacheStruts2-Docker
  • https://github.com/Thirukrishnan/CVE-2023-50164-Apache-Struts-RCE
  • https://github.com/helsecert/cve-2023-50164
  • https://vulncheck.com/xdb/6b23f76ae74b
  • https://github.com/dwisiswant0/cve-2023-50164-poc
  • https///github.com:dwisiswant0/cve-2023-50164-poc.git
  • https://vulncheck.com/xdb/2eedf38daab7
  • https://github.com/bcdannyboy/CVE-2023-50164
  • https///github.com:bcdannyboy/CVE-2023-50164.git
  • https://github.com/jakabakos/CVE-2023-50164-Apache-Struts-RCE
  • https://github.com/minhbao15677/CVE-2023-50164

KEV: True

Shodan Query: http.title:"struts2 showcase"

Acceptance Criteria: The template must include a complete POC and should not rely solely on version-based detection. Contributors are required to provide debug data(-debug) along with the template to help the triage team with validation or can also share a vulnerable environment like docker file.

Rewards will only be given once the template is fully validated by the team. Templates that are incomplete or invalid will not be accepted. Avoid adding code templates for CVEs that can be achieved using HTTP, TCP, or JavaScript. Such templates are blocked by default and won’t produce results, so we prioritize creating templates with other protocols unless exceptions are made.

You can check the FAQ for the Nuclei Templates Community Rewards Program here.

entry.content:

entry.title: elFinder Command Injection Vulnerability
entry.content:
漏洞信息

漏洞名称： elFinder Command Injection Vulnerability

漏洞编号：

  • CVE： CVE-2019-9194

漏洞类型： 命令执行

漏洞等级： 严重

漏洞描述： elFinder在2.1.48版本之前存在命令注入漏洞，由于PHP连接器未对输入进行适当清理，攻击者可以通过发送精心构造的请求来执行任意命令。

产品厂商： elFinder

产品名称： elFinder

影响版本： version < 2.1.48

搜索语法： http.title:”elfinder”

来源： https://github.com/projectdiscovery/nuclei-templates/issues/12288

类型： projectdiscovery/nuclei-templates:github issues

来源概述

Description:

elFinder before 2.1.48 contains a command injection caused by unsanitized input in the PHP connector, letting attackers execute arbitrary commands, exploit requires attacker to send crafted requests.

Severity: Critical
POC:
  • https://www.exploit-db.com/exploits/46481/
  • https://www.exploit-db.com/exploits/46539/
  • https://github.com/cved-sources/cve-2019-9194

KEV: True

Shodan Query: http.title:"elfinder"

Acceptance Criteria: The template must include a complete POC and should not rely solely on version-based detection. Contributors are required to provide debug data(-debug) along with the template to help the triage team with validation or can also share a vulnerable environment like docker file.

Rewards will only be given once the template is fully validated by the team. Templates that are incomplete or invalid will not be accepted. Avoid adding code templates for CVEs that can be achieved using HTTP, TCP, or JavaScript. Such templates are blocked by default and won’t produce results, so we prioritize creating templates with other protocols unless exceptions are made.

You can check the FAQ for the Nuclei Templates Community Rewards Program here.

漏洞名称： elFinder Command Injection Vulnerabilit

entry.title: Wazuh 反序列化远程代码执行漏洞
entry.content:
漏洞信息

漏洞名称： Wazuh 反序列化远程代码执行漏洞

漏洞编号：

  • CVE： CVE-2025-24016

漏洞类型： 反序列化

漏洞等级： 严重

漏洞描述： Wazuh是一个免费开源的威胁预防、检测和响应平台。从版本4.4.0开始到4.9.1之前，存在一个不安全的反序列化漏洞，允许在Wazuh服务器上执行远程代码。DistributedAPI参数被序列化为JSON并使用as_wazuh_object（位于framework/wazuh/core/cluster/common.py中）进行反序列化。如果攻击者能够在DAPI请求/响应中注入未经过滤的字典，他们可以伪造一个未处理的异常（__unhandled_exc__）来评估任意Python代码。任何具有API访问权限的人（被入侵的仪表板或集群中的Wazuh服务器）或在某些配置下甚至是被入侵的代理都可以触发此漏洞。版本4.9.1包含修复。

产品厂商： Wazuh

产品名称： Wazuh

影响版本： 4.4.0 <= version < 4.9.1

来源： https://github.com/B1ack4sh/Blackash-CVE-2025-24016

类型： CVE-2025:github search

仓库文件

  • README.md

来源概述

CVE-2025-24016 Wazuh Remote Code Execution (RCE) - PoC 🚨

Description:

Wazuh is a free and open source platform used for threat prevention, detection, and response. Starting in version 4.4.0 and prior to version 4.9.1, an unsafe deserialization vulnerability allows for remote code execution on Wazuh servers. DistributedAPI parameters are a serialized as JSON and deserialized using as_wazuh_object (in framework/wazuh/core/cluster/common.py). If an attacker manages to inject an unsanitized dictionary in DAPI request/response, they can forge an unhandled exception (__unhandled_exc__) to evaluate arbitrary python code. The vulnerability can be triggered by anybody with API access (compromised dashboard or Wazuh servers in the cluster) or, in certain configurations, even by a compromised agent. Version 4.9.1 contains a fix.

Metrics:

CNA: GitHub, Inc. Base Score: 9.9 CRITICAL Vector: CVSS:3.1/AV:N/AC:L/PR:L/UI:N/S:C/C:L/I:H/A:H

Proof of Concept:

To trigger this vulnerability using the server API, follow the steps below.

PoC Burp Suite Request:

  1. Burp Suite Request to Trigger the Vulnerability:
  1. Explanation of Request:
  • Authorization Header: This is the base64-encoded authorization (wazuh-wui:MyS3cr37P450r.*-).
  • Payload: The malicious payload contains the unsanitized exception __unhandled_exc__ which triggers the execution of arbitrary Python code (exit in this case).

Disclaimer ⚠️

For educational and research purposes only. Use only against systems you own or have permission to test.
entry.summary:
漏洞信息

漏洞名称： Wazuh 反序列化远程代码执行漏洞

漏洞编号：

entry.title: Wazuh Web Interface 版本检测漏洞
entry.content:
漏洞信息

漏洞名称： Wazuh Web Interface 版本检测漏洞

漏洞编号：

  • CVE： CVE-2024-57378

漏洞类型： 信息泄露

漏洞等级： 中危

漏洞描述： 该漏洞涉及Wazuh Web Interface的版本检测问题，通过特定的Nuclei HTTP模板可以检测目标URL（及其/app/login页面）是否为Wazuh web界面，提取wazuhVersion值，并确认页面可访问（200状态）且确实是Wazuh UI（通过标题和关键词匹配）。如果提取的版本为4.8.2，Nuclei会报告匹配。

产品厂商： Wazuh

产品名称： Wazuh Web Interface

影响版本： 4.8.2

来源： https://github.com/rxerium/CVE-2024-57378

类型： CVE-2024:github search

仓库文件

  • CVE-2024-57378.yaml
  • README.md

来源概述

CVE-2024-57378

How does this detection method work?

This Nuclei HTTP template checks a target URL (and its /app/login page) for the Wazuh web interface, extracts the wazuhVersion value with a regex, and confirms the page is accessible (200 status) and actually a Wazuh UI (via title and keyword match). If the extracted version is 4.8.2, Nuclei reports a match

How do I run this script?

  1. Download Nuclei from here
  2. Copy the template to your local system
  3. Run the following command: nuclei -u https://yourHost.com -t template.yaml

References

  • https://nvd.nist.gov/vuln/detail/CVE-2024-57378

Disclaimer

Use at your own risk, I will not be responsible for illegal activities you conduct on infrastructure you do not own or have permission to scan.

Contact

Feel free to reach out to me on Signal.
entry.summary:
漏洞信息

漏洞名称： Wazuh Web Interface 版本检测漏洞
